channel.title: How to add a npc to my server
channel.description: how do i add a npc to my server ( like what do i open and how do i do it?

item.title: How to add a npc to my server
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

Thats the layoutâ€¦
Put in like this in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 530	3193	3432	0	0	0	0	0	1	shop keeper

Spawn = npc id #
Save, Compile, Run. =]

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a npc to my server

item.title: How to add a npc to my server
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg and hang on ill explain the rest

spawn = 516 2853 9639 0 2854 9640 2852 9638 2 Obli

the spawn = 516 is the npc ID of the npc you want to spawn.

The 2853 is the X coordinate and the 9639 is the Y.

the 0 is the highth(allways use 0 if its on the ground.)

2854 is the RangeX1

9640 is the -RangeY1

2852 is the RangeX2

9638 is the RangeY2

2 is weather or not you want it to move.

obli is a short description of the monster(usealy the name of it)

Read full topic
